Key Match Events: Isiah Kiner-Falefa had three hits, including a go-ahead single in the fifth inning, as the Pittsburgh Pirates avoided a three-game sweep with a 4-3 win over the Kansas City Royals on Sunday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pittsburgh Pirates avoided a three-game sweep with a 4-3 win over the Kansas City Royals on Sunday.
The game was played at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Others: Isiah Kiner-Falefa had three hits, including a go-ahead single in the fifth inning
Brady Singer (9-13, 3.71) pitched for the Kansas City Royals
Jared Jones (6-8, 4.14) pitched for the Pittsburgh Pirates
